biotools.summary: Funnel-Metadynamics Advanced Protocol (FMAP), which is a flexible and user-friendly graphical user interface (GUI)-based protocol to perform funnel metadynamics, a binding free-energy method that employs a funnel-shape restraint potential to reveal the ligand binding mode and accurately calculate the absolute ligand–protein binding free energy. FMAP guides the user through all phases of the free-energy calculation process, from preparation of the input files, to production simulation, to analysis of the results.
